code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[status,setStatus]=useState("Carregando...");useEffect(()=>{async function fetchStatus(){try{const apiUrl=window.RUNTIME_CONFIG.REACT_APP_API_URL;console.log("→ Backend API URL:",apiUrl);const response=await fetch("".concat(apiUrl,"/status"));const data=await response.json();setStatus(JSON.stringify(data,null,2));}catch(error){console.error("Erro backend:",error);setStatus("Erro ao conectar ao backend");}}fetchStatus();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontFamily:"Arial",padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"TechRoute Frontend"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Status do Backend:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:status})]});}export default App;
